title: stix1x-coa-extension-schema
description: This is the coa extension schema used by the stix-elevator

objective.description: Characterizes the objective of this CourseOfAction

objective_confidence.description: Characterizes the level of confidence held in the applicability of this course of action for its targeted objective.

parameter_expression.description: This property enables the specification of technical parameters to this course of action expressed as a STIX pattern

impact.description: This property characterizes the estimated impact of applying this course of action.

cost.description: This property characterizes the estimated cost for applying this course of action

efficacy.description: This property characterizes the effectiveness of this course of action in achieving its targeted objective

coa-stage-ov.description: Specifies what stage in the cyber threat management lifecycle this course of action is relevant to (e.g. remedy or response).
